it.polimi.se2018.controller

Class ToolCardController

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.controller.ToolCardController

  • class ToolCardController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements the logic behind the ToolCard object. Every toolcard is stored and its functioning described.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private static class  ToolCardController.Operations
      A static class where belongs all operations of every toolcard.

      • getOperations

        java.util.Queue<java.util.function.BiFunction<ToolCardController,PlayerMove,PlayerState>> getOperations()

      • handleMove

        PlayerState handleMove(PlayerMove playerMove)
        Applies the player's move on the first operation of the ops Queue. If the returned state is REPEAT, the operation must be repeated. Poll it otherwise.
        Parameters:
        playerMove - of the player
        Returns:
        the new state at the end of the operation
